1.name: Blackboard Jungle
1.description: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

2.name: To Catch a Thief
2.description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

3.name: The Glass Slipper
3.description: Tomboyish outcast "Cinder" Ella and the duke's charming son Charles fall in love in this comedic rendition of the classic fairy tale.

4.name: The Scarlet Coat
4.description: During the Revolutionary War, American Major John Boulton feigns desertion in order to uncover a British plot to seize the stronghold of West Point.

5.name: Rebel Without a Cause
5.description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

6.name: East of Eden
6.description: A wilful young man contends against his brother for the attention of their religious father while reconnecting with his estranged mother and falling for his brother's girlfriend.

7.name: Oklahoma!
7.description: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

8.name: The Night of the Hunter
8.description: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

9.name: Good Morning, Miss Dove
9.description: Miss Dove is a strict disciplinary, plus a well respected teacher, who has inspired her students to individual greatness. One day during class, Miss Dove experiences great pain in her back,...                See full summary »

10.name: Lady and the Tramp
10.description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

11.name: To Hell and Back
11.description: The true WWII story of Audie Murphy, the most decorated soldier in U.S. history. Based on the autobiography of Audie Murphy who stars as himself in the film.

12.name: Trial
12.description: Courtroom drama set in 1947 and underlying post-WW2 acute problems facing the USA such as stormy race relations and the growing threat of local communism.

13.name: Mister Roberts
13.description: In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.

14.name: Les diaboliques
14.description: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal hatch a plan to murder him while having the perfect alibi. They carry out the plan...but then his body disappears.

15.name: The Kentuckian
15.description: A Kentucky widower bound for 1820's Texas with his young son is thwarted in his efforts by a corrupt constable, a long-standing family feud, and a beautiful indentured servant.

16.name: Guys and Dolls
16.description: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

17.name: The Seven Year Itch
17.description: When his family goes away for the summer, a so far faithful husband is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.

18.name: The Beast with a Million Eyes
18.description: A dysfunctional family operating an isolated date farm in the California desert is threatened by the arrival of an extra-terrestrial.

19.name: This Island Earth
19.description: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

20.name: The Man with the Golden Arm
20.description: A strung-out junkie deals with a demoralizing drug addiction while his crippled wife and card sharks pull him down.

21.name: The Spoilers
21.description: In 1899 Alaska, miners have to protect themselves from a phony legal team trying to steal their gold claims.

22.name: The Ladykillers
22.description: Five diverse oddball criminal types planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

23.name: The Court-Martial of Billy Mitchell
23.description: A dramatization of the American general and his court martial for publically complaining about High Command's dismissal and neglect of the aerial fighting forces.

24.name: Du rififi chez les hommes
24.description: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

25.name: Man with the Gun
25.description: When a notorious tough 'town tamer' is hired by the citizenry to rid of the gunmen driving them off their land, he finds the local saloon madam to be an old friend.

26.name: Marty
26.description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

27.name: The Trouble with Harry
27.description: The trouble with Harry is that he's dead, and everyone seems to have a different idea of what should be done with his body.

28.name: Kiss Me Deadly
28.description: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

29.name: The Man Who Loved Redheads
29.description: The honourable Mark St. Neots is playing with some 'chums' when he meets and is bowled over by Sylvia. As he grows older he retains his image of this beautiful young girl with the red hair....                See full summary »

30.name: Pather Panchali
30.description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

31.name: The Court Jester
31.description: A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful king.

32.name: The Big Combo
32.description: A police lt. is ordered to stop investigating deadly crime boss Mr. Brown, because he hasn't been able to get any hard evidence against him. He then goes after Brown's girlfriend who despises him, for information instead.

33.name: All That Heaven Allows
33.description: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

34.name: Bad Day at Black Rock
34.description: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

35.name: Killer's Kiss
35.description: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.

36.name: Summertime
36.description: A lonely American woman unexpectedly finds romance in Venice, Italy.

37.name: Sissi
37.description: In the first of a trilogy of movies about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria, the young vibrant princess catches the eye of her sister's fiancé, Emperor Franz Josef.

38.name: Love Me or Leave Me
38.description: A fictionalized account of the career of jazz singer Ruth Etting and her tempestuous marriage to gangster Marty Snyder, who helped propel her to stardom.

39.name: Tarantula
39.description: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in giantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.

40.name: Man Without a Star
40.description: A drifter working as foreman for an iron-fist female rancher must chose sides between his attractive employer and the other neighboring settlers who are mistreated by her.

41.name: Land of the Pharaohs
41.description: A captured architect designs an ingenious plan to ensure the impregnability of tomb of a self-absorbed Pharaoh, obsessed with the security of his next life.

42.name: Bride of the Monster
42.description: A mad doctor attempts to create atomic supermen.

43.name: Ordet
43.description: Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.

44.name: One Jump Ahead
44.description: A hard-boiled reporter tries to solve a mysterious crime despite an increasingly complicated love life.

45.name: The Indian Fighter
45.description: A scout leading a wagon train through hostile Indian country unwittingly gets involved with a Sioux chief's daughter.

46.name: Tall Man Riding
46.description: Larry Madden returns after several years still vowing to avenge himself against the humiliating whipping he received at the hands of cattle baron Tucker Ordway.

47.name: Revenge of the Creature
47.description: Men capture the creature from the Black Lagoon and make him an aquarium attraction, from which he escapes.

48.name: The Dam Busters
48.description: The story of how the British attacked German dams in WWII by using an ingenious technique to drop bombs where they would be most effective.

49.name: Smoke Signal
49.description: A suspected cavalry deserter proves to be resourceful in helping the surviving members of a fort, flee Indians along a dangerous river.

50.name: Gojira no gyakushû
50.description: Godzilla battles an irradiated Ankylosaur and destroys Osaka in the process.
